org.neodatis.odb
Interface ObjectRepresentation

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultObjectRepresentation
public interface ObjectRepresentation

used to give the user an instance of an object representation, level2. The Object Representation encapsulate the NonNativeObjectInfo which is the internal object representation. This is used in the Server triggers.

Author:
olivier
